name: Classic Bruschetta with Pesto

ingredients.name: Pesto Sauce Mix or Bruschetta Seasoning
Herbed Garlic Sea Salt Blend or salt

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to broil.
  2. Lay baguette slices on lined Sheet Pan and lightly spray with oil using a spray pump. Broil for 2 min each side, or until golden.
  3. Combine tomatoes, sauce mix, oil, salt and pepper in a small mixing bowl.
  4. Spoon 1 tbsp mixture onto each baguette slice. Sprinkle with Parmesan and serve.
tips: To boost fibre intake, use a whole-grain baguette
